website_summaries.verdict: Despite not decisively beating the competition in any one area, the Samsung Notebook 9 comes close across the board, making it a safe, if not exactly exciting choice for a slim 15-inch laptop.
pros: The Samsung Notebook 9 packs a big 15-inch screen into a slim, light body, plus a Core i7 CPU, all at a very attractive price
cons: The design is bland, the keyboard is on the shallow side, and the base model has only a lower-res, non-touch display

customer_reviews.title: Returned because one key wouldn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Overall although I loved this laptop I was very disappointed with it particularly when one key on keyboard wouldn't work at all. I really wanted to love this as replacement for older version of the same computer. I've had the old one for 8 years and have loved it. This one wasn't the same quality and just didn't feel right. Very disappointing really wanted another one to love like the old one...
customer_reviews.author: TXAmazonCust

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with my Samsung laptop
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Weighs hardly anything - Doesn't get hot - No fan noise at all - Fast - Reasonably priced - Great screen quality Cons: No backlit keyboard. That's sorely missed on this laptop as I work well into the night and/or early morning hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeping in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Samsung = Excellent! Buy one if you're in the market for a new laptop.
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely wonderful laptop. The screen rival's a MacBook Pro Retina in quality if not a bit better. The weight is amazing as is the speed. Love it and highly recommend it to anyone looking to buy a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ross G. Homer - Author of the Avenging Angel series

customer_reviews.title: this feels like a feather
customer_reviews.text: This computer is fast, lightweight and speedy. What more could you ask for? Compared to my previous MacBook Pro, this feels like a feather. It's also faster. I was used to Win 7 and this has Win 10. While I still prefer Win7, Win 10 isn't so bad - just takes a little getting used to. Good product. Good value. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TruthTeller

customer_reviews.title: Good machine, runs linux
customer_reviews.text: Good quality lap top, still running strong after the first year. Pros: - Works with linux (tested fedora 23). - Chasis is sturdy but very light. Screen is large and vibrant. - Hardware is very fast. Cons: - Still using barrel-jack power connector. These are basically guaranteed to fail after two or three years. - Keyboard does not light up. - Advertised battery life is a lie (I get about 4-5 hours with a typical workload).
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Monkey

customer_reviews.title: An exceptionally good laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is the best computer (laptop, desktop, or workstation in the last 30 years) I've ever worked on, my own or at work. The keyboard turned out to be better than I expected (the best in any laptop I worked on) and it is... yes, it is pleasant to type on it :) The touchpad is also the best, in my experience. If this laptop only had a back-lit keyboard I would have no choice but to insist it should have a 5 1/2 star rating. This was my first Samsung product and it impressed me greatly, enough to buy a Galaxy Note5 (have been very happy with it as well).
customer_reviews.author: Gene Skuratovsky

customer_reviews.title: The best laptop I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop! Very nice screen, super light, great keyboard, and fast CPU. The build quality is excellent as well. The only issue I've had is that the touchpad is quite sensitive. However, I didn't use this with the installed Windows 10 at all, I installed Ubuntu immediately, and Ubuntu does typically require some settings tweaks when it comes to touchpads in general, so I can't really knock the laptop on this point. After tweaking it is fine, and the feel of the touchpad is excellent - very smooth. I'm a software developer, photographer, videographer, and night course teacher, so I use my laptops in a wide variety of ways, and am absolutely satisfied with this excellent laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Smotherman

customer_reviews.title: Third party seller, the laptop box was not sealed
customer_reviews.text: The item as opened, not sealed packed. The battery life was terrible, within 5 mins of opening youtube, battery went down from 100% to 80%.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had more features but its STILL GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this laptop! I'm a computer technician and I use this for work. This laptop is so sleek and light and just absolutely works great! Pros: Big and amazing screen quality Very light and thin Boots up fast and is ready to go in under 10 seconds Cons: No backlight on keyboard Speakers are on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: David Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I love the Samsung's ultrabooks
customer_reviews.text: I like very much the New Series 9 Samsung's ultra-books. I have one - model 2012, and its a masterpiece (the metal body, keyboard are fantastic). This one I bought now is newer than mine and is still is very good (performance, screen, battery). I would like to be built with the same materials like my old one, but that is it what it is. The seller sent my order super fast! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again. Keyboard letter "c" fell off and ...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't buy again. Keyboard letter "c" fell off and I'd have to send it away for a week for repair. I constantly have to restart for the touch function to work
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: It stands the test of time!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for over 3 years now, and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great slim, light and sturdy laptop
customer_reviews.text: Received this a few days ago. Vibrant screen, solid build and lightweight. Great specs for the money. I haven't used it for Audio production yet but that's the main reason I upgraded.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Love it being light weight and having the big screen
customer_reviews.text: Love it being light weight and having the big screen. Great for carrying to the office etc. I wanted it to take when I travel but I think I'm going to have to get a tablet as the big screen is a little large for planes etc.
customer_reviews.author: S.M. Sprowl

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this computer for his consulting business. He is very happy with the computer and he is very hard to please! He replaced an old Toshiba laptop which finally bit the dust. A very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mainor

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but this one thing is driving me crazy...
customer_reviews.text: In general I am satisfied with this product. Everything is as advertised. One interesting note is that this laptop can snugly fit in a 14.1" laptop sleeve. However there is one problem with the Intel graphics driver that is driving me crazy. Intel has a feature called "Display Power Saving Technology" which is very irritating. Basically it dims and brightens the display automatically depending on what is being displayed is light coloured or dark coloured (note: it does not depend on ambient light level). After I disabled this feature, it just enables itself automatically after a few minutes. There is no way I can keep the setting disabled.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan So

customer_reviews.title: thin, stylish and fast but a little pricey if ...
customer_reviews.text: thin, stylish and fast but a little pricey if money is not the issue, pick this over the 13 inch version
customer_reviews.author: Fort

customer_reviews.title: Light weight is most benefit
customer_reviews.text: I use notebook for office usage, most of program is well work. And SAMSUNG notebook quality is already proved.
customer_reviews.author: TONY SON

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Super light and durable. Only drawback is the shallow keyboard, where my fingers can hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Chen

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: Great display, lightning fast booting up and so light. Wireless display to my Samsung TV works but super hard to navigate a cursor. Fine for video and presentations but don't expect to do any mouse intensive work with the wireless display
customer_reviews.author: Doug King

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this laptop. I am really hard to please with laptops because, often, the screen/display quality and the keyboard fall short of my expectations. HOWEVER, this laptop is AMAZING! My favorite part is that the screen folds down flat on the table, so when my MBA classmates and I are doing group work we can (all six of us) huddle around my laptop screen and work off of the same computer. ABSOLUTELY PERFECT PRODUCT--I AM IN LOVE. Every time I take it out to do work with it I am so thankful I got this one instead of a much cheaper one I was thinking of from another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Performance good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Performance good, design good, and very light. Fully satisfied with it. Only cons is its body is vulnerable to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Heonsoo Lee

customer_reviews.title: Got the laptop for the 15" screen. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the laptop for the 15" screen. I have no complaints at all. Other then there was no place to go see the laptop before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: FooGee

customer_reviews.title: I had this less than 7 months and it broke ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this less than 7 months and it broke. No one knows what happen and how to fix. This does not last long.
customer_reviews.author: JB lee

customer_reviews.title: I really do love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this laptop. My old one was so old and heavy. The only downside so far is the battery life is not what they claim. I am using google chrome which I love. They tell me to get better battery life I should use microsoft edge. Its still gives me 5 hours of play so I'm ok with it since I use it at home mostly. I may switch to edge to try it but for now i'm good.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Kozloski

customer_reviews.title: Terrible service from Samsung. Battery dead after little more than a year. Will not buy ANY Samsung product.
customer_reviews.text: Battery completely died after a little over a year of regular usage.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: very nice laptop at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: It's of very good quality and light-weighted. I've installed Linux and made it dual-boot, which works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Cutelucky the

customer_reviews.title: This computer gets great ratings on consumer reports and great ratings from me
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is slim and lightweight. The processor is solid. This computer gets great ratings on consumer reports and great ratings from me. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: I never had a computer that came up as fast ...
customer_reviews.text: I never had a computer that came up as fast as this one. Is all you see in descripción ítem. 100% recomendad
customer_reviews.author: N. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: 15" lighter than a macbook air for Windows lovers
customer_reviews.text: The 15" is incredibly light. Great graphics and audio. It turns on and off in 2-3 seconds. No annoying pre-installed software. The keyboard makes you wanna use it forever, so good! No backlit keyboard but that's not a big deal, you can still see the keys in the dark (screen light). Great battery. Excellent set of available I/O ports. The charger connector scares me a bit as the wire is too flexible and the connecting point too slim
customer_reviews.author: 4pk

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: For long I have been searching for the most light-weight laptop and this guy is just what I need! Well done Samsung! Has all the bells and whistles that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Bhaven P.

customer_reviews.title: All good!
customer_reviews.text: extremely fast, light and bright -- nothing not to like. Only complaint: wish it could upgrade RAM to 12 or 16 Gb. But both spreadsheets and videos are fast and clear, with no jitter and very wide field of view. Really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice notebook. Very happy with it. Battery life could be longer.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, very thin and light weight. After 3 months of usage, the unit is working perfectly. I only wish the battery last longer. I clock in at 3-4hrs max.
customer_reviews.author: PGF

customer_reviews.title: So far I really love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: So far I really love this laptop... notebook?... whatever I give up. It is so light weight, sleek, portable. Long battery life (so far). Its fast, fast start up and web browsing. I use OneDrive to store documents I create using Microsoft online and photos from my phone. I plan to use my external hard drive for everything else. Not impressed with SideSync though.
customer_reviews.author: random person

customer_reviews.title: We don't need no steenkin' backlit keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Does everything we expect of it and does it quickly. With my YouTube Channel I use it for editing and uploading. Communicates with all my cameras and other equipment without hesitation. Windows 10 is an improvement over Windows 8.
customer_reviews.author: Snubby

customer_reviews.title: perhaps best at the market today
customer_reviews.text: Very slim and light laptop. Screen is very clear and colorful, top quality, perhaps best at the market today. Cord which is power supply low part to laptop looks little bet cheap. Quit hard and I don think so very long life time it could be broken soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jurij Sinicyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice traveling laptop
customer_reviews.text: great laptop - nice and light for travel - I love that it didn't come with a bunch of 'bloatware'
customer_reviews.author: C. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: It is light and easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: It is light and easy to carry around. The resolution of the screen is sharp and clear. It has all the features of my desktop, but now I can conveniently take my work with me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harley

customer_reviews.title: Fast small footprint laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very nice laptop. My wife uses it and likes it a lot. Very fast which she really likes. no waiting for boot delay. Ideal for use in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: OAKIE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop. So lightweight, fast and easy to use. Glad I purchased this after much research.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great. On set up you can choose which type ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. On set up you can choose which type of keyboard you want. I set it up with a French keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L. Faerber

customer_reviews.title: but it's a great, slim
customer_reviews.text: Machine complies with published specs. Too early to comment detailed, only got it for 3 weeks, but it's a great, slim, big screen laptop and runs fast. Just a pity that it seems so difficult for Samsung to let their latest notebook just connect to their latest smart TV's in an easy way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: portable power - very light laptop with great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop at a great price. I was pleasantly surprised how light this unit is and how good the built in graphics are on the screen. Only challenge is that I was using a mac air before and when plugging into the same monitor, the screen resolution was not as crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best laptop of the 20 or so I have ever owned. Thin and light.
customer_reviews.author: James Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight for its size
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.. Very light weight and long battery life.. I am happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Ali E Uysal

customer_reviews.title: Super sleek, crazy fast
customer_reviews.text: Love my new computer!! Never had one this light. Thanks, Samsung and Amazon. Warning: cover scratches and dents fairly easily, so get some protection decals or something right away. Worth it for this amazing machine.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I get a continuous electric shock by touching some edge of the laptop. Some keys don't work sometimes. I press a key, then another key enters. Comes and goes randomly. I got the videos. Right-arrow key broke under normal use. Exterior casing started to break. I had a good battery life of 6 hours of light office use, then it dropped to 1.5 hours all of sudden around the 7th month. I still have plenty of battery life. This product is unreliable. I requested a repair but I'm afraid the entire electric board is exposed to electric shock and the integrity of the laptop is compromised.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get the touchpad to work on ubuntu. That's fine I got a Logitech T650 to work instead with it. A+ Laptop feels like a top of the line product. *** editing this review: If you can't get your touchpad to work on ubuntu. Check out the peripherals in gsettings and turn it on. My settings were off. SO I wasted money on an external touchscreen mouse... But I got an external touchscreen mouse. Great laptop. I do programming and some data science and it holds up to all of my tasks. 10:10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristoph Reign

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a super light! Awesome item. It's runs quite fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Kabyun Wun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pros: light weight and fast Cons: limited battery life and storage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this computer but if it has HDMI connector, it should be awesome.:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good travel Notebook
customer_reviews.text: It is so light , which makes it great when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: MRW

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AN AMAZING LAPTOP!!!! :) Super Light and Small for traveling yet Fast enough to play my Games = I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: CrzyLdy

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter and I am so jealous
customer_reviews.text: I cannot think of anything I would change on this laptop
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ultrabook for an amazing price! Can't beat it for quality, style, and price.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: The Computer I Have Been Waiting For
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to get this computer. Been waiting almost a year, since a sales guy at Best Buy told me about it. Arrived in perfect condition. I am setting it all up now but so far it is working perfectly. Under 3 pounds Nice size screen. Clear as a bell. Fast.
customer_reviews.author: GlassJohnJean

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great until the I saw a message that battery is ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great until the I saw a message that battery is no longer working/charging. It was at 82% and when disconnected from power supply it would die immediately. Today it won't start with or without the power cord. It is completely dead...I bout it in May of this year (6 months ago). Let's see how Samsung will handle this one.
customer_reviews.author: Miskra

customer_reviews.title: I don't see all the hate for this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Some computer program fonts are blurry. I'm not sure if it's just this samsung screen, or a defective laptop, but it's really annoying. It doesn't look sharp. Also sometimes it lags, actually quite a quit when just scrolling through webpages, also freezes sometimes I'm probably gonna return this. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: noah333

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Flimsiest keyboard ever. Keys are super loose and feels le they can easier pop out. Key travel is very shallow too. Very poor build quality too. Easy to scratch or snap.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Customers who is purchasing 15" model, be aware. ...
customer_reviews.text: Customers who is purchasing 15" model, be aware... This model has manufacturing defect, confirmed by Samsung, and they are recalling all of them. There's no keyboard backlight and they are changing the hardware through the service requests for every single customer who ordered 15" model.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry G

product_meta.title: Samsung NP900X5L-K02US Notebook 9 15" Laptop (Iron Silver)
product_meta.description: Samsung’s Notebook 9 15” brings together a sleek, compact chassis with maximum screen space, making it impressive to use and easy to use on the go. The bright screen, long battery life, and convenient features enhance your notebook experience
feature_bullets: Powerful 6th-Gen Intel Core i7-6500U 2.5GHz (Turbo up to 3.1GHz)
15-Inch Full-HD LED Display with Windows 10 Pre-installed
256GB Solid-State Drive for fast boot, great performance, and enhanced reliability
Superior connectivity 802.11a/c WiFi and Gigabit mini Ethernet port
Latest technology with micro HDMI, 2x USB 3, and USB Type C

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars144 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
